channel.title: How do i add pics to my post im about to release my v1 server
channel.description: I have my server screenshots of my server but how do i get them into a mopar post to show people my server before they download it?

item.title: How do i add pics to my post im about to release my v1 server
item.dc:creator: @sunnydays sunnydays
item.description:
@sunnydays wrote:

ok[quote=“sunnydays, post:2, topic:228842”]ok go to www.imageshack.us and upload a picture and below the little picture is the fourms url thigo copy and past that and u got urself a picture[/quote]

[quote=“sunnydays, post:2, topic:228842”]ok go to www.imageshack.us and upload a picture and below the little picture is the fourms url thigo copy and past that and u got urself a picture[/quote]ok to get into detail here a pic xD

item.title: How do i add pics to my post im about to release my v1 server
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

First register at a host like photobucket.com

Then upload all ure screenies, when uploaded they give u the embed codes, u need the img code ones.

Just paste the codes into your post.

Brndan

Read full topic
